definitions: The action of obstructing or the state of being obstructed.
A thing that impedes or prevents passage or progress; an obstacle or blockage.
(in various sports) the action of unlawfully obstructing a player in the opposing team.
Blockage of a bodily passage, especially the gut.
The action of impeding the movement of traffic on a highway.
The action of deliberately hindering the police in their duties.
